deleteSynonym

public String deleteSynonym(String index,
                            String term)
                     throws IOException
Deletes a given term from the synonym list for a given index. Returns true if deletion was succesful, false otherwise.

addSynonym

public String addSynonym(String index,
                         String term,
                         String synonym)
                  throws IOException
Adds a given term to the synonym list for a given index. Returns true if addition was succesful, false otherwise.

Parameters:
index - index to use
term - term to add
synonym - its synonym
Returns:
String addition status
Throws:
IOException
